source.condition: and pk_fatherorg=(select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12='HZQYB0014')

item.name: 预算利润总额>1千万元的企业户数

source.condition: and vyear='2014' and sb_lrze/10000>1000 and sys_fjd=(select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12='HZQYB0014')

item.name: 预算利润总额>1亿元的企业户数

source.condition: and vyear='2014' and sb_lrze/10000>10000 and sys_fjd=(select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12='HZQYB0014')

item.name: 预算营业总收入增长率>100%的企业户数

source.condition: and vyear='2014' and zj_yyzsr/10000>100 and sys_fjd=(select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12='HZQYB0014')

item.name: 预算营业总收入>1亿元的企业户数

source.condition: and vyear='2014' and sb_yyzsr/10000>10000 and sys_fjd=(select pk_org from cp_orgs where def12='HZQYB0014')
